updated.title: Your app has been updated to version 23!
updated.content:
Updates include:
•BugFixes
•New literature including Just For Today, Who Me?, and A Newcomer Asks.
•A support us section has been added at the bottom of the homepage, please feel free to read the message posted there.

needsUpdate.title: A new version is available!
needsUpdate.content:
Clicking the button below will take you to the app store where you can manually update the app by clicking 'update'.

Updates include bug fixes, updated literature, and a new support us section.
